topic: DIVA Day registration is now open
body:
Dear RADIANCE community,






We are pleased to announce that the registration<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2016> for DIVA Day 2016 is now open. DIVA Days is an annual symposium to discuss the use of DIVA and associated environmental analysis tools in design practice, research and architectural education. Previous events were in 2015<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2015> at the Architecture Association, 2014<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2014> in Seattle, 2013<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2013> at Thornton Tomasetti's offices in New York and 2012<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2012> at MIT. DIVA Day 2016 will be hosted by the John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape and Design at the University of Toronto on Friday, September 30.






In addition to the symposium, we will be offering a full day of DIVA training<http://www.eventbee.com/v/diva-day-toronto> on September 29. Classes will range from the basics of daylighting modeling in Rhino to more advanced parametric modeling in Grasshopper using DIVA 4.0.






As in previous years, we are organizing a student competition<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2016/student-competition> with the winning team having the opportunity to present at DIVA Day. This year's prize money will be $US 1500.






We are looking forward to welcoming some of you at these events,


The Solemmas
Solemma<http://www.solemma.net/> | DIVA<http://www.diva4rhino.com/>
___
